      • getPublicGraphs

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Graph> getPublicGraphs(RestClient restClient,
                                                         java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> graphNames,
                                                         java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> tagsList,
                                                         int limit,
                                                         int offset)
                                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        This method can be used to get public graphs from GraphSpace. REMEMBER: Using both graphNames and tagsList will return the intersection of the the matches. If you need the union of those searches make two individual requests instead.
        Parameters:
        restClient(RestClient) - defines the methods and other connection variables used by the Rest API
        graphNames(ArrayList<String>) - Search for graphs with the given given list of possible graph names. In order to search for graphs with given names as a substring, wrap the name of the graph with percentage symbol. For example, %xyz% will search for all graphs with 'xyz' in their names
        tagsList(ArrayList<String>) - Search for graphs with the given given list of tag names. In order to search for graphs with given tag as a substring, wrap the name of the tag with percentage symbol. For example, %xyz% will search for all graphs with 'xyz' in their tag names
        limit(int) - Number of entities to return
        offset(int) - Offset the list of returned entities by this number
        Returns:
        list of public graphs based on graph names and tags
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getSharedGraphs

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Graph> getSharedGraphs(RestClient restClient,
                                                         java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> graphNames,
                                                         java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> tagsList,
                                                         int limit,
                                                         int offset)
                                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        This method can be used to get shared graphs from GraphSpace. REMEMBER: Using both graphNames and tagsList will return the intersection of the the matches. If you need the union of those searches make two individual requests instead.
        Parameters:
        restClient(RestClient) - defines the methods and other connection variables used by the Rest API
        graphNames(ArrayList<String>) - Search for graphs with the given given list of possible graph names. In order to search for graphs with given names as a substring, wrap the name of the graph with percentage symbol. For example, %xyz% will search for all graphs with 'xyz' in their names
        tagsList(ArrayList<String>) - Search for graphs with the given given list of tag names. In order to search for graphs with given tag as a substring, wrap the name of the tag with percentage symbol. For example, %xyz% will search for all graphs with 'xyz' in their tag names
        limit(int) - Number of entities to return
        offset(int) - Offset the list of returned entities by this number
        Returns:
        list of shared graphs based on graph names and tags
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getMyGraphs

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Graph> getMyGraphs(RestClient restClient,
                                                     java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> graphNames,
                                                     java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> tagsList,
                                                     int limit,
                                                     int offset)
                                              throws java.lang.Exception
        This method can be used to get private graphs from GraphSpace. REMEMBER: Using both graphNames and tagsList will return the intersection of the the matches. If you need the union of those searches make two individual requests instead.
        Parameters:
        restClient(RestClient) - defines the methods and other connection variables used by the Rest API
        graphNames(ArrayList<String>) - Search for graphs with the given given list of possible graph names. In order to search for graphs with given names as a substring, wrap the name of the graph with percentage symbol. For example, %xyz% will search for all graphs with 'xyz' in their names
        tagsList(ArrayList<String>) - Search for graphs with the given given list of tag names. In order to search for graphs with given tag as a substring, wrap the name of the tag with percentage symbol. For example, %xyz% will search for all graphs with 'xyz' in their tag names
        limit(int) - Number of entities to return
        offset(int) - Offset the list of returned entities by this number
        Returns:
        list of private graphs based on graph names and tags
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
